We're fighting a lot of golems, which is causing a lot of weapons to shatter. Resupply is slow or nonexistent, so we must think creatively.

If you could kill the {@LinkCreature:27#2#ancient bladegolems} and bring their remnants to us, we could repair or reforge our equipment. The notion of drawing strength from weakening our foe is definitely appealing.
Quite a harvest. Our smiths will be delighted, as will our surviving troops. Thanks.
They're little metal creatures. You destroy them and collect the remains. It's very ecologically sound.
